sentences.sentence: As these trends converge, diasporas will move even closer to centre stage in the delivery of succour to the needy.
sentences.translation: 这些趋势集中到一点，在向穷困者发送救援品方面，散居在外者将更接近舞台中心。

sentences.sentence: Diasporas have been a part of the world for millennia.
sentences.translation: 几千年以来移居群体一直是世界的一部分。

sentences.sentence: Such stories mark a big turnaround for diasporas, which over the last century have often had to wage an uphill struggle against time and geography.
sentences.translation: 这些故事标志着海外犹太人的一个大回转，而在上个世纪，这还必须通过发动一场相对时间与地理的上升抗争才能达到。
